metadata.title: CVE-2020-21048 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue in the dither.c component of libsixel prior to v1.8.4 allowsattackers to cause a denial of service (DOS) via a crafted PNG file.

criterions.comment: libsixel: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
